description.p: InfiniPaint is a collaborative, infinite space, infinite zoom, canvas note-taking/drawing app. Unlike many other infinite canvas apps, there is no zoom in or zoom out limit. This means that this app is very good at things such as drawing sketches of the solar system to scale, or just drawing any massive objects with tiny details. Of course, this app is also perfectly well suited for use as a normal canvas.

ul.li: Infinite canvas, with infinite zoom
Open online lobbies for collaboration
Graphics tablet support (Pressure sensitive brush and eraser detection)
Layers with blend modes
Saveable color palettes
Right click to open a quick menu
Place bookmarks on the canvas to jump to later
Undo/Redo
Screenshot to export parts of the canvas to a picture (can export to raster formats or SVG)
Place text boxes with formatting
Other tools such as: Rectangle select tool, Lasso select tool, Color picker tool, Grid tool, Rectangle tool, Ellipse tool, Line tool
Copy and paste objects on the canvas, and between different canvases
Insert images and files on the canvas
Send objects to front or back of layer through right click popup menu
Change color of outlines and brush strokes through selection tool
Improved cache system increases FPS
Popup menu to save files before closing
Tool configuration is saved
Lock brush/outline size from zoom
Move selected objects with arrow keys
Switch from pan to zoom when pen touches tablet
Every tool has its own size value
Added layers, with support for layer folders, blend modes, and layer alpha
Bookmarks can now be placed in folders
Added line tool
Improved network system increases performance on both client and server side
Improved undo/redo system
Images can be cropped
Can now paste images from the clipboard
Add right click popup menu for selection and text editing
Added a brush minimum size option, and removed the change brush size with mouse speed option
Fixed crash when pasting rich text in GUI textbox
Fixed some GUI elements not responding after a while
Fixed other players' cursors not being shown when they're very far away
Added mouse double click and triple click text selection
Can now type tabs into textboxes
Replaced an embedded font
Unicode support across the entire app
Text boxes now have many more formatting options
UI theme changed
Drag and drop direct URLs to images to download them onto the canvas
Images/Resources that are being downloaded will show download progress
Downloading resources won't completely stop other types of data from being sent
VSync and display scaling options added
Window scaling taken into account in some types of input (drag and drop files)
Fixed program crashing when undoing an edit to an editable element (textbox, ellipse, rectangle)
Fixed program crashing when zooming in/out too fast
p2p.json is now accessible from the user configuration directory, allowing you to change the signaling server, STUN server, and TURN server list
Text input is a bit more responsive
Can now infinitely zoom into the canvas
Added a grid tool
SVG screenshots can be taken
Added a pan tool, zoom tool, and rotate wheel to the toolbar
Edit tool can now be used to select single objects
Rearranged parts of the UI
Improved performance when drawing brushstrokes with transparency
Network related bugfixes
Clipboard related bugfixes
New cache system that leads to major performance improvements for canvases with many objects
Lasso select tool added
Savefiles are compressed, leading to smaller files
Large network messages are compressed, leading to better online performance
Can embed and display SVG files on the canvas
Can display more raster image types: webp, wbmp
Selection can be modified by holding left shift to add to selection, or holding left alt to remove from selection
Can change canvas background color

description.p: Added flatpak metainfo. Release is equivalent to previous version.
Added a button to upload an image/file to the canvas, as an alternative to drag drop.
Fixed a segmentation fault that occurred when clients disconnected from the server.
